All area is very well connected by bus or/and train to/from Budapest. All Commuter rails (BHÉV) except 'H7' reached the region. Density: three-six per hour all lines, all directions. Logo is:
Budapest based almost every public transport lines. This means sometimes must go first to Budapest and then out to your destination, even that means a much longer way.
